title: What are some websites like tjori.com? - Quora

response.answer_text: Honestly, I had tried e-commerces like Amazon for apparel and jewellery but the quality was a hit-and-miss. I found Tjori as a sponsored advertisement on my feed and I fell in love with their nosepins. I ordered 3, and all of them were superb quality. I bought them a year ago, and they are still in good condition, after constant wear. I’ve been shopping at Tjori ever since. You might find similar things here and there, but not with guaranteed quality and originality. You can hit-or-miss with Amazon and Flipkart though.
